reviews.name: Sarah Muthoni
reviews.review_text: This bundle is absolutely incredible! I used the barber shop plan and opened my salon in Westlands. The licensing guide saved me weeks of research. Highly recommend!

reviews.name: James Ochieng
reviews.review_text: Best investment I've made this year. The M-Pesa agent guide helped me set up my business in just 2 weeks. The ROI calculations were spot on!

reviews.name: Grace Wanjiku
reviews.review_text: Started my bakery using their plan. The equipment list and supplier contacts were invaluable. My business is now profitable after 3 months!

reviews.name: David Kamau
reviews.review_text: The greenhouse tomatoes guide is detailed and practical. I followed it step by step and my harvest was amazing. Worth every shilling!

reviews.name: Mary Njeri
reviews.review_text: Used the laundry business plan to start my venture in Thika. The market analysis was accurate and helped me position my business perfectly.

reviews.name: Peter Otieno
reviews.review_text: Great bundle with comprehensive plans. The only reason I didn't give 5 stars is because some of the supplier phone numbers were outdated, but I found alternatives easily.

reviews.name: Faith Akinyi
reviews.review_text: Excellent value for money. The plans are detailed and practical. Minor issue: some of the license costs mentioned have increased slightly since the update.

reviews.name: John Mwangi
reviews.review_text: Very helpful resource. Used the courier services plan successfully. Small suggestion: would be nice to have more recent case studies, but the core information is solid.

reviews.name: Lucy Wambui
reviews.review_text: Great bundle that helped me start my agrovet business. The only minor issue is that some of the equipment prices have changed due to inflation, but the business logic is sound.

reviews.name: Michael Kiprop
reviews.review_text: Used the tiles retail plan to great success. The market analysis was spot on. Small note: some of the regulatory requirements have been updated, but the core business model remains valid.
